clinical_study.brief_title: G-Eye Advanced Colonoscopy For Increased Polyp Detection Rate-randomized Tandem Study With Different Endoscopist
clinical_study.official_title: G-Eye Advanced Colonoscopy For Increased Polyp Detection Rate - Randomized Tandem Study With Different Endoscopist

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to compare the adenoma detection rate of G-EYE™ high definition colonoscopy with that of standard high definition colonoscopy.

detailed_description.textblock: Single Center, two-arm, randomized , open-label study with different and blinded endoscopists.

primary_outcome.measure: G-EYE™ colonoscopy detection rate of adenomas and serrated lesions compared to the standard colonoscopy detection rate of the same.

secondary_outcome.measure: polyp and adenoma detection, procedure times and safety

arm_group.description: Subjects will undergo complete standard colonoscopy, followed by G-EYE(TM) Colonoscopy
Subject will undergo G-EYE(TM) colonoscopy followed by standard colonoscopy
